title: Criticism of the Western Civilization-C 67 (Failed Democracy 3)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 67 (Failed Democracy 3):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Agamben et al - Democracy, in What State (2011)

-  Allan - Democracy in Decline; Steps in the Wrong Direction (2014)

-  Bassetti - Electoral Dysfunction; a Survival Manual for American Voters (2012)

-  Berman - Give Us the Ballot; the Modern Struggle for Voting Rights in America (2015)

-  Boggs - Phantom Democracy; Corporate Interests and Political Power in America (2011)

-  Bovard - Attention Deficit Democracy (2005)

-  Buckley - Saving Congress from Itself; Emancipating the States & Empowering Their People (2014)

-  Bush - The Taming of Democracy Assistance; Why Democracy Promotion Does Not Confront Dictators (2015)

-  Cain - Democracy More or Less; America's Political Reform Quandary (2015)

-  Chalmers - Reforming Democracies; Six Facts About Politics That Demand a New Agenda (2013)

-  Dean - Democracy and Other Neoliberal Fantasies; Communicative Capitalism and Left Politics (2009)

-  Derber - Hidden Power; What You Need to Know to Save Our Democracy (2005)

-  Diamond & Plattner (Eds.) - Democracy in Decline (2015)

-  Fuller - Beasts and Gods; How Democracy Changed Its Meaning and Lost Its Purpose (2015)

-  Gastil - Democracy in Small Groups; Participation, Decision Making, and Communication (1993)

-  Geiz et al (Eds.) - The Militant Face of Democracy; Liberal Forces for Good (2013)

-  Giraudy - Democrats and Autocrats; Pathways of Subnational Undemocratic Regime Continuity within Democratic Countries (2015)

-  Greenberg - Republic in Spin; an Inside History of the American Presidency (2016)

-  Hasen - Plutocrats United; Campaign Money, the Supreme Court, and the Distortion of American Elections (2016)

-  Huizinga - The New Totalitarian Temptation; Global Governance and the Crisis of Democracy in Europe (2016)

-  Kaiser - So Damn Much Money; the Triumph of Lobbying and the Corrosion of American Government (2010)

-  Kurlantzick - Democracy in Retreat; the Revolt of the Middle Class and the Worldwide Decline of Representative Government (2013)

-  Lewis - Political Mercenaries; the Inside Story of How Fundraisers Allowed Billionaires to Take Over Politics (2014)

-  Mayer - Dark Money; the Hidden History of the Billionaires Behind the Rise of the Radical Right (2016)

-  McClennen - Colbert's America; Satire and Democracy (2011)

-  Morgan - Revolution to Devolution; Reflections on Welsh Democracy (2014)

-  Murray - A Democracy of Despots (1995)

-  Mutch - Buying the Vote; a History of Campaign Finance Reform (2014)

-  Pinckney - Blackballed; the Black Vote and US Democracy (2014)

-  Schwarz - Democracy in the Dark; the Seduction of Government Secrecy  (2015)

-  Sekulow - Undemocratic; How Unelected, Unaccountable Bureaucrats Are Stealing Your Liberty and Freedom (2015)

-  Shrivastava & Stefanick (Eds.) - Alberta Oil and the Decline of Democracy in Canada (2015)

-  Shultziner - Struggling for Recognition; the Psychological Impetus for Democratic Progress (2010)

-  Taverne - The March of Unreason; Science, Democracy, and the New Fundamentalism (2005)

-  Wiszniowski (Ed.) - Challenges to Representative Democracy; a European Perspective (2015)
